passages.text:
Tann::Any updates on the rodent infestation problem?  How did that go?

Jasper,thinking::Anthony Tann?  That's the administrator who was complaining about Vera in those notes we found earlier.

[[C->Page 2]]
passages.name: Page 1

passages.text:
Frost::The rat your nurses found in the vent?  It's taken care of.

Frost::It's got the sleeping sickness now.  It won't bother you again.

[[C->Page 3]]
passages.name: Page 2

passages.text:
Tann::I take it there isn't much chance of it waking up?  I'd rather not call pest control.

Tann::I can't risk a repeat of last year's incident.

[[C->Page 4]]
passages.name: Page 3

passages.text:
Frost::You won't have any further problems.  

Frost::I'll see to it personally this time.

[[C->Page 5]]
passages.name: Page 4

passages.text:
Jasper,thinking::Strange exchange.  Sounds like they are speaking in code about something....

Jasper,sad::"Rat" in the vents, that nurses found...

Jasper,head_tilted::Do you think they're talking about Vera?

[[Vera?]]
[[The psychotic-obsessive woman they kept trying to throw off?->Vera?]]

links.name: The psychotic-obsessive woman they kept trying to throw off?

passages.name: strange_exchange

passages.text:
Jasper::Yes, her.

Jasper::She said in her last note that she was going to spy on one of their operations.  Maybe they caught her?

[[Definitely seems likely.->Start]]
[[Let's try and find out what's inside this safe before we decide for sure.->Start]]

links.name: Let's try and find out what's inside this safe before we decide for sure.

passages.name: Vera?

passages.text:
Tann::Good.  Very good.

Tann::Did you manage to recover any of the materials I was after?

[[C->Page 6]]
passages.name: Page 5

passages.text:
Frost::All of them.  They'll be here in my safe until I get word from you on how to process them.

[[C->strange_exchange]]
passages.name: Page 6

passages.text:
You enter a small office room.  A typewriter rests atop a grime-covered desk, and old documents spill out of the drawers.  In the corner, you notice a conspicuous locked safe.

[[(Action) Inspect the documents in the drawers.]]
[[(Action) Inspect the safe.]]
[[p:(Action) Leave.]]

links.name: (Action) Inspect the documents in the drawers.
links.link: (Action) Inspect the documents in the drawers.

passages.name: Start

passages.text:
You rifle through the documents left in the desk.  Most of the documents consist only of administrative minutia.  However, you come across one exchange that catches your attention.

[[C->Page 1]]
passages.name: (Action) Inspect the documents in the drawers.

passages.text:
You move in a little closer to the small safe.  It appears to be a combination lock mechanism.

[[Do you think I should kick it?]]
[[Please let me kick it.  This is what I was born to do.]]

links.name: Do you think I should kick it?
links.link: Do you think I should kick it?

links.name: Please let me kick it.  This is what I was born to do.
links.link: Please let me kick it.  This is what I was born to do.

passages.name: (Action) Inspect the safe.

passages.text:
Jasper,twisted::If you want another broken toe, sure.

Jasper,thinking::I wouldn't expect results, though.

Jasper,surprised::Let's keep looking around some of the other rooms, we might be able to find the code to this lock.

[[Alright, fine...->Start]]
passages.name: Do you think I should kick it?

passages.text:
Jasper,twisted::No.  You'll just break your other toe.

Jasper,head_tilted::You've only got like, eight or nine of those left.

Jasper,surprised::Let's keep looking around some of the other rooms, we might be able to find the code to this lock.

[[Alright, fine...->Start]]
passages.name: Please let me kick it.  This is what I was born to do.
